info.task: navigate backwards into a contentinfo landmark
info.title: Navigate backwards into a contentinfo landmark in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterContentinfo
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the contentinfo landmark
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the contentinfo landmark
testPageDocument.getElementById('afterlink').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Bottom' link.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Bottom' link.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.
